Django-PuSH
===========

PubSubHubbub support for Django

Usage
-----

The documentation is at http://packages.python.org/django-push

Contributing
------------

* The project is on github: http://github.com/brutasse/django-push
* To setup a development environment, run::

      python bootstrap.py
      ./bin/buildout

  Then run the tests::

      ./bin/test
